recipe.title: Fresh Green Salsa (Salsa verde cruda)
ingredients: 1/2 pound tomatillos (5 or 6), husked, rinsed, and coarsely chopped
2 fresh jalapeño or serrano chiles, coarsely chopped (including seeds), or more to taste
instructions: Put the tomatillos in a blender first, then add the remaining ingredients. Pulse a few times, then blend until the salsa is very smooth, at least 1 minute. Season to taste with additional chile and salt, and blend again.
